titleStmt.title: The last speech and confession of Oliver Plunket, titular Primate of Ireland with an account of his behavior in Newgate, since his condemnation : and also of Edward Fitz-Harris : at their execution at Tyburn, upon Fryday, July 1, 1681, for high treason, in conspiring the death of the King, &c.
titleStmt.author: Plunket, Oliver, Saint, 1629-1681.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
